content.rendered:
After Graduating in law (LLB Hons) Farrah pursued a successful career in investment banking where she worked for several top institutions in the City. Farrah has over a decade of experience managing the documentation team through numerous initiatives including process improvement, risk and policy and representation on industry calls.

Farrah’s most recent experience was a move into HR within the education sector where she gained over 5 years of experience covering the complete end to end process of HR from providing support and guidance to managers and staff, managing recruitment and on-boarding, employee relations, reviewing and aligning HR policies and internal procedures in addition to the management and training of supply staff. Farrah worked closely with the leadership team to ensure there was HR support for Ofsted inspection and audits. Farrah has recently completed the CIPD level 7 in HRM making her an Associate member.
